object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1756526&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=213017-0-2-EXT%3A134925%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;mappingName=&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803"><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/madrid/hotel/0/015706/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="ME Madrid Reina Victoria - 4* - Madrid" title="ME Madrid Reina Victoria - 4* - Madrid"> </a>

ME Madrid is a luxury design hotel, located in historic Plaza Santa Ana. It offers elegant rooms with plasma TV and hydromassage shower. The hotel is 300 metres from the Puerta del Sol. Each room has an iPod dock, adjustable lighting and climate control plus a safety deposit box with integrated laptop charger. Additional hotel facilities include free Wi-Fi access, 24hr room service, ice dispenser on each floor and a 24hr fitness centre.

Situated in one of Madrid's most famous thoroughfares, this high quality hotel offers exclusive rooms and suites, as well as several meeting rooms, a restaurant and a fitness & health centre. Not only rooms and suites are well equipped to make your stay the most comfortable but dedicated staff look after even the smallest details.

object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1756625&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=216727-0-2-EXT%3A138815%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;mappingName=&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803"><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/madrid/hotel/3/391bf8c01f/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Husa Princesa - 4* - Madrid" title="Husa Princesa - 4* - Madrid"> </a>

The Husa Princesa hotel is located in the entertainment area of Madrid, walking distance to Plaza España and Gran Via and is housed in the same complex as the El Corte Ingles department store. It offers free use of a 1700m⊃2; sports centre with gym and a small indoor pool. Private parking is available at an extra cost and offers direct access to rooms. Argüelles Metro Station is directly outside the hotel and is on 3 different lines. Rooms at the Husa Princesa are spacious and classic.

In the well known Gran Via, this hotel is a a fantastic choice if you want to stay for the weekend in the capital. Surrounded by boutiques, shops and restaurants it has a great location near to all the famous attractions. *The hotel offers air conditioning during summer.

object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1756708&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=212836-0-2-EXT%3A134717%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;mappingName=&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803"><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/madrid/hotel/0/058296/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Husa Paseo del Arte - 4* - Madrid" title="Husa Paseo del Arte - 4* - Madrid"> </a>

An avant-garde hotel, opened in 2006 and just 100 metres from Puerta de Atocha train station. Placed at The Gold Triangle, a unique cultural place surrounded by the Prado Museum, the Thyssen Bornemisza and Reina Sofia Art Museum. 260 natural daylight and minimal décor lay-out bedrooms and suites, all equipped with the latest technologies. A very light full breakfast room, restaurant, fitness room and rooftop solarium, room service, large car park and Wi-Fi in Husa Paseo del Arte.

Recommended for those who want to enjoy the best of Madrid and its main attractions. The Petit Palace Londres hotel was renovated in 2001 and is located in an emblematic building. The rooms are tastefully decorated and come equipped.

In Lavapies, one of the most traditional, colourful and lively neighborhoods of the capital city of Madrid, you can find the H2 Atocha complex of apartments. Ideally located, the property is very close to the major attractions of the city including Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol, Retiro Park and the famous museums of Reina Sofia and Prado.

In the famous Gran Via of Madrid, in one of the most emblematic buildings. It has a terrace on the roof with fantastic views. Stylish and designed hotel close to Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. Theatres, museums, shops and business areas are all close. Vincci Capitol Hotel combines elegant and designed accommodation with excellent location and fantastic views offered from the lounge bar. It also features the Nammu Spa centre including an ice fountain and massage service.

object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

The fantastic location and accessibility of the hotel makes it the ideal base whether for families or business. Real Madrid's Santiago Bernabeu stadium is in sight of the hotel. Situated within easy access & connections to all major city ring roads and 20 minutes away from International Airport Madrid Barajas. All the rooms are highly equipped with air conditioning, satellite & pay TV, and ADSL Internet connection. In summer you can cool down in our rooftop pool.

Confortel Pio XII is a modern, convenient hotel on Avenida del Pio XII in Madrid's business district with easy access to Barajas Airport. Enjoy being the guest here with contemporary surroundings, attentive service and comfortable rooms. The hotel includes free WiFi and free internet in the lobby.

Enjoy your stay at this recently refurnished hotel located in the Barrio de Salamanca one of the most exclusive shopping areas in Madrid. The hotel is also well connected to the main museums and attractions of the city by subway. The nearest metro station is only 300 metres away with a direct connection downtown.

Completely renovated in 2008 and located just steps away from Madrid's main square, Plaza de Espana, this modern hotel offers spectacular views of the Royal Palace and Casa de Campo. It is perfectly situated within walking distance of Gran Via, Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol and Madrid's main museums Prado, Thyssen, Reina Sofia. A metro stop can be found at the entrance of the hotel allowing travel to the airport or Madrid's main local attractions.

Vincci SoMa is located in the heart of Madrid, close to major attractions, museums and the most luxury fashion shopping area. The Hotel offers Free Wi-FI connection, gym and parking. Vincci SoMa is the best option to discover Madrid and its principal tourist attractions, just steps away from Goya underground station, connected with the airport.

De Las Letras H&R is located in the heart of the city. It features an exquisite combination of the building's original tiles, canopies and stone carvings coupled with the latest in interior design. The rooms are painted in the original tones and decorated with inscriptions of quotes by famous writers. In DL's Restaurant you can taste an author's cuisine in harmony with an extensive Japanese menu. DL's Lounge is a large bar where you can share some tapas or enjoy a variety of cocktails.

Located in the lively Chueca neighbourhood and close to Gran Via, Petit Palace Ducal hotel is the ideal starting point to discover the main tourist attractions. object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1757346&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=212435-0-2-EXT%3A4461%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;mappingName=&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803"><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/madrid/hotel/1/127020/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Mercure Madrid Santo Domingo - 4* - Madrid" title="Mercure Madrid Santo Domingo - 4* - Madrid"> </a>

Mercure Madrid Santo Domingo Hotel is a unique hotel with 200 rooms, right in the heart of Madrid, offering an excellent location and great services. Among the hotel's many attractive features you will find themed rooms with murals created by up-and-coming artists, the lobby, crowned with porcelain and gold leaf arches, and the decorated car park. Also available: over 1200 m2 of room space with natural light for meetings or banquets and an outdoor rooftop pool with fantastic views over Madrid.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1757410&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=212264-0-2-EXT%3A4536%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;mappingName=&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803"><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/madrid/hotel/2/201799/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Tryp Cibeles - 4* - Madrid" title="Tryp Cibeles - 4* - Madrid"> </a>
Calle Mesoneros Romanos. 13 Corner of Gran Via

The Tryp Cibeles hotel is located right in the Gran Via of Madrid nearby the theatres where the most important musicals are played. Close to the Plaza Mayor square, Puerta del Sol, Palacio Real (Royal Palace), Congreso de los Diputados and the famous museums El Prado, Reina Sofia and Thyssen. It occupies one of the many emblematic buildings of the Spanish capital. Free Wi-Fi in premium and fitness rooms is available.

object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1757457&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=1057726-0-2-EXT%3A147881%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803&amp;mappingName="><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/madrid/hotel/1/113867/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Regina Hotel - 3* - Madrid" title="Regina Hotel - 3* - Madrid"> </a>

The Regina hotel is located in the heart of the commercial, bank and tourist area of madrid, just 3 minutes from Puerta del Sol and close to the most important monuments and museums of the city. The hotel has 180 rooms totally reformed with modern and comfortable facilities.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: H10 Villa de la Reina - 4* - Madrid
Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1757495&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=photos&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=212604-0-2-EXT%3A4393%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;mappingName=&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803"><img src="http://m.travelocity.com//images/madrid/hotel/0/060077/Exterior_H_1.jpg" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="H10 Villa de la Reina - 4* - Madrid" title="H10 Villa de la Reina - 4* - Madrid"> </a>

Charming hotel located in Madrid's famous Gran Via. It occupies a historic building and was last renovated in 2008. Within walking distance from the triangle of Art and the shopping area, it is just the perfect hotel in Madrid to stay whether for business or private purposes.

object.name: hotel_output_data
object.attribute: Elegant hotel in Castellana-Serrano area - 4* - Madrid

<a href="http://globaltrips.lastminute.com/trips/productDetailsInternal?roomOptions=true&amp;pTxId=1756434&amp;checkInDate=2011-12-11&amp;checkOutDate=2011-12-13&amp;guestCounts=1&amp;tabId=information&amp;guestCodes=ADULT&amp;propertyIds=216313-1-2-EXT%3A134925%24v1v%24&amp;configId=S72722479&amp;city=madrid&amp;numRooms=1&amp;dest=MAD&amp;_gsid=S72722479-T068V014607428407147262730472124321856&amp;path=hotels&amp;hotelRequestId=319504560562803&amp;mappingName=#"><img src="http://cdn2.travelpn.com.edgesuite.net/trips/11.05.1/brand/lastminute/img/tsh.png" class="hotel-thumbnail" alt="Exclusive and Unique Hotel with ideal location - 4* - Madrid" title="Exclusive and Unique Hotel with ideal location - 4* - Madrid"></a>

Trendy and Cool. Perfectly allocated in the heart of the historic city center, steps away from the famous Museum del Prado and la Puerta del Sol. Whether you are in the mood to shop, sight-see or just stroll through the lively neighborhood, everything is within walking distance.
